description: Announces its presence by multicasting <<vol2_clause_dev_23_message_helloab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Hello>> messages to all listening systems.

Listens for <<vol2_clause_dev_23_message_helloab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Hello>> messages to identify any <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>>s that it may exchange messages with and further retrieve a <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>>'s service capabilities.

Initiates communication by sending <<vol2_clause_dev_24_message_probeab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Probe>> or <<vol2_clause_dev_24_message_resolveab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Resolve>> messages to <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>>s. Then listens for <<vol2_clause_dev_24_message_probe_matchab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113ProbeMatch>> and <<vol2_clause_dev_24_message_resolve_matchab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113ResolveMatch>> messages to discover those <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>>s that it intends to exchange messages with and further retrieves the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>>'s service capabilities.

Listens for <<vol2_clause_dev_24_message_probeab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Probe>> and <<vol2_clause_dev_24_message_resolveab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Resolve>> messages, which it responds to with <<vol2_clause_dev_24_message_probe_matchab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113ProbeMatch>> or <<vol2_clause_dev_24_message_resolve_matchab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113ResolveMatch>> messages, respectively.
Asks for the resource representation of the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> via the <<vol2_clause_dev_25_message_get_metadataab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113GetMetadata>> message.

Sends its resource representation to the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_consumer>> via the <<vol2_clause_dev_25_message_get_metadata_responseab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113GetMetadataResponse>> message.

Initiates communication by first subscribing to a <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> by sending a <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_subscribeab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Subscribe>> message. While the subscription is running, the subscription is kept alive by sending <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_renewab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Renew>> messages and receiving <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_notificationab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Notification>> messages.

Finally, the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_consumer>> unsubscribes from a <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> by sending an <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_unsubscribeab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Unsubscribe>> message.

Listens for <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_subscribeab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Subscribe>>, <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_renewab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Renew>> and <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_unsubscribeab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Unsubscribe>> messages, which it responds to with <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_subscribe_responseab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113SubscribeResponse>>, <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_renew_responseab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113RenewResponse>> or <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_unsubscribe_responseab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113UnsubscribeResponse>> messages respectively.
While a subscription is running, the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> delivers <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_notificationab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Notification>> messages.

When at some point the subscription has to be ended, the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> sends a <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_subscription_endab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113SubscriptionEnd>> message.

label: Notify Change in System Context and Capabilities

description: Listens for a <<vol2_clause_dev_28_message_notificationab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Notification>> message to retrieve context updates.
While a subscription is running, the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> delivers <<vol2_clause_dev_28_message_notificationab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Notification>> messages.
Listens for a <<vol2_clause_dev_29_message_notificationab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Notification>> message to retrieve update reports.
While a subscription is running, the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> delivers <<vol2_clause_dev_29_message_notificationab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Notification>> messages.

Initiates communication by sending a <<vol2_clause_dev_30_message_getmdibab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113GetMdib>> message to a <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>>. Then listens for a <<vol2_clause_dev_30_message_getmdibresponseab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113GetMdibResponse>> message to retrieve the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>>'s MDIB.

Listens for <<vol2_clause_dev_30_message_getmdibab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113GetMdib>> messages, which it responds to with <<vol2_clause_dev_30_message_getmdibresponseab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113GetMdibResponse>> messages respectively.
Listens for <<vol2_clause_dev_46_message_helloab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Hello>> or
<<vol2_clause_dev_46_message_byeab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Bye>> messages to add or
remove <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> endpoint metadata to/from its
internal database.
When joining a <<acronym_somds>>, it announces its presence to the
<<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_discovery_proxy>>. When deliberately leaving the
<<acronym_somds>>, it announces its absence to the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_discovery_proxy>>.
Forwards <<vol2_clause_dev_46_message_helloab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Hello>>
and <<vol2_clause_dev_46_message_helloab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Bye>>
messages received from <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>>s.
Responds to incoming <<vol2_clause_dev_47_message_probeab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Probe>>
and <<vol2_clause_dev_47_message_resolveab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Resolve>> messages.
Uses <<vol2_clause_dev_47_message_probeab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Probe>> and
<<vol2_clause_dev_47_message_resolveab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Resolve>>
messages to seek endpoint metadata.
Optionally subscribes to a <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_discovery_proxy>> in order
to receive <<vol2_clause_dev_47_message_helloab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Hello>>
and <<vol2_clause_dev_47_message_helloab491a58-caf0-4c64-a06b-9427930f7113Bye>> messages.
